document_data.caption: A simple wooden spatula.
document_data.name: Spatula
document_data.mainbody: '''Spatulas''', referred to as '''osaye''' in [[Wa-an]], [[the Vast]], and on [[Wa]].
document_data.Description: Spatulas were defined by their large, flat heads that allowed them to carry food and other substances.
document_data.History: Sometime in the 14{{th}} century DR, the cargo ship ''[[The Gentle Lady]]'' was delivering a shipment of farmer and merchant goods to a small coastal community in the [[Dragon Reach]].{{Cite organized play/LC/How Long Can You Tread Water?|9-10}} Among the goods being carried by the ship was a crate full of cookware that included eighteen spatulas.{{Cite organized play/LC/How Long Can You Tread Water?|12}}
